headline: Cognizant Technology Solutions (NasdaqGS:CTSH) Partners With TestHuset For On-Site TaaS Expansion In Denmark
summary: Cognizant Technology Solutions (NasdaqGS:CTSH) recorded a 3.92% price increase over the last quarter, a movement likely influenced by its recent partnership with TestHuset announced on March 5, aimed at advancing software testing services in Denmark. The company also declared an increased quarterly dividend of $0.31 per share and executed a substantial share repurchase program amounting to $140 million. Additionally, its earnings update on February 5 reported higher year-over-year sales for...
